summary: The first film adaptation of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic novel about a land where prehistoric creatures still roam.
cast: Bessie Love|Lewis Stone|Wallace Beery|Lloyd Hughes|Alma Bennett|Arthur Hoyt|Margaret McWade|Bull Montana|Frank Finch Smiles|Jules Cowles|George Bunny|Charles Wellesley|Jocko the Monkey|Arthur Conan Doyle|Mary the Chimpanzee|Malcolm Denny|Virginia Brown Faire|George Marion|Nelson McDowell|Gilbert Roland|Leo White
title: El mundo perdido
